settings.content: If you need update your current theme version to the latest read [Documentation how to update the theme](https://smart-ecom-solutions.com/lumia/documentation/online/updates/)
Or order us to update the theme and we will do everything for you (not a free solution). Just [create a ticket](https://big-skins.com/help/).

settings.label: Hide out of stock items
settings.info: We do not advice to hide product cards with this option. We advice to do it using collection filters in the [collection admin panel interface](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/inventory/getting-started-with-inventory/hide-out-of-stock#:~:text=You%20can%20use%20automated%20collections,your%20store's%20default%20Catalog%20collection). But if you have a lot of collections and do not want to edit each collection then you can shardly hide out of stock item here.

settings.label: Theme ID with light colors

settings.info: [How to get Theme ID](https://www.howcommerce.com/shopify-theme-id/#extract-the-shopify-theme-id-via-the-admin-section-of-your-store)

settings.content: [Here](https://smart-ecom-solutions.com/lumia/documentation/online/colorization/#steps-to-apply-preset-theme-style) is described how to apply [dark theme style](https://smart-ecom-solutions.com/lumia/documentation/online/colorization/#global-color-dark) to theme.
!IMPORTANT! Fill Dark Light Mode settings in both Light and Dark themes. It is necessary that dark and light themes link to each other.

settings.label: Products source

settings.content: Complementary recommendations can be manually set up. Recommended products for each intent can be configured using the [Shopify Search & Discovery app](https://apps.shopify.com/search-and-discovery?shpxid=3da80ec0-4662-4103-85B3-1E002866A225).

settings.label: Enable login popup
settings.info: Recommended only for Legacy customer accounts. Disable popup if you use Customer accounts. To manage Customer accounts go to your [customer settings](/admin/settings/customer_accounts).
To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)
To add a country/region, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)
